bill_title: permit the filing of certain agricultural lien documents with the Office of the Secretary of State by electronic means.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to permit the filing of certain agricultural lien documents with the Office of the Secretary of State by electronic means. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 57A-9 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The Office of the Secretary of State may establish and maintain a secure and interactive website where agricultural liens may be filed and accessed by interested parties. 180 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.063 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
